sentences.sContent: It should be used primarily to hyphenate words in justified type.
sentences.sContent_eng: It should be used primarily to hyphenate words in justified type.
sentences.sCn: 他应该使用于字母断行连接时。

sentences.sContent: I feel shame and guilt telling my female friends who chose to keep their last names or hyphenate.
sentences.sContent_eng: I feel shame and guilt telling my female friends who chose to keep their last names or hyphenate.
sentences.sCn: 和那些保留了自己的姓或使用了连字符的女友们谈起时，我会觉得内疚、没面子。

words.tran: 用连字符连接（hyphenate的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to join words or  syllables  with a  hyphen
